text: Aur hum ney yahudiyon kay zimmay toraat mein yeh baat muqarrar ker di thi kay jaan kay badlay jaan aur aankh kay badlay aankh aur naak kay badlay naak aur kaan kay badlay kaan aur daant kay badlay daant aur khaas zakhmon ka bhi badla hai phri jo shaks iss ko moaf ker dey to woh iss kay liye kuffara hai aur jo log Allah kay nazil kiye huye kay mutabiq hukum na keren wohi log zalim hain
